summary: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.
cast: Margarita Terekhova|Oleg Yankovskiy|Filipp Yankovskiy|Ignat Daniltsev|Nikolay Grinko|Alla Demidova|Yuriy Nazarov|Anatoliy Solonitsyn|Larisa Tarkovskaya|Tamara Ogorodnikova|Yuri Sventisov|Tamara Reshetnikova|Innokentiy Smoktunovskiy|Arseniy Tarkovskiy|E. Del Bosque|Ángel Gutiérrez|Tatiana Del Bosque|Teresa Del Bosque|L. Correcer|Diego García|Teresa Rames|Olga Kizilova|Aleksandr Misharin
title: El espejo
